description.p: Along with a well laid out and rather roomy set of bags with enough storage space for the standard adventurer's pack plus some additional odds and ends; This Lifting Belt Doubles the weight a character can Push, Pull, or Carry. For paticularly heavy objects, the wearre may use an action to lift something up to 4 times their standard maximum for a period of time equal to 6 seconds times their Strength Ability Modifier.
